definition: interest (desire to know about sth)/interest (thing in which one is interested)/hobby/CL:個|个[ge4]
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)

sentences.english: But sometimes, ISP's and mail service businesses have no interest in righting what went wrong.
sentences.chinese: 但有時，互聯網的業務和郵件服務沒有興趣糾正想歪。

sentences.english: Dvorak was interested in the folk music of both Europe and North America.
sentences.chinese: 德沃夏克對歐洲和北美洲的民間音樂很有興趣。

sentences.english: We are all cool kids with our own interests.
sentences.chinese: 我們都是擁有自己興趣的酷孩子。

sentences.english: That may be the best wayto incorporate your hobby into your career.
sentences.chinese: 這可能是將你的興趣融合到工作中的最佳方式了。

sentences.english: My extracurricular activities include the Math and Drama Clubs.
sentences.chinese: 我的課餘活動包括參加數學興趣小組和戲劇社。

sentences.english: Your price is too high to even interest buyers in counter-offer.
sentences.chinese: 你的價格太高，買方連還盤都沒有興趣。

sentences.english: Then are you interested in listening to a story about him?
sentences.chinese: 那你有興趣聽一個關於他的故事嗎？

sentences.english: My first interest in snooker occurred when I was seven years old.
sentences.chinese: 我最初對斯諾克產生興趣是在七歲的時候。

sentences.english: Some of them skip classes just because they have no interest in certain subjects.
sentences.chinese: 有的跳班僅僅是因爲他們沒有在某些科目的興趣。

sentences.english: Do you want to pre-register the Following Fair?
sentences.chinese: 請問閣下是否有興趣優先登記以下展覽會？

sentences.english: The only thing these interests he is cash.
sentences.chinese: 一個使他感興趣的事件根本那是多掙錢。

sentences.english: I have learned to act quickly and take interest in learning.
sentences.chinese: 學會了迅於行和保持學習興趣。

sentences.english: It doesn’t interest me if the story you’re telling me is true.
sentences.chinese: 你說的是真是假我不感興趣。

sentences.english: Bao-chai seemed interested in the fact that Bao-yu was there.
sentences.chinese: 寶釵似乎對寶玉當時在場這件事更感興趣。

sentences.english: Social psychologists always are interested in inter-group behavior researches.
sentences.chinese: 羣際行爲研究一直是社會心理學家的興趣所在。

sentences.english: Students can choose according to their interest in professional degree curriculum.
sentences.chinese: 學生可根據自己的興趣選擇專業學位課程。

definition: regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
specialty/specialized field/main field of study (at university)/major/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]/professional
plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to know/to recognize/to be familiar with/to get acquainted with sb/knowledge/understanding/awareness/cognition
